main.name: Aisma Nurlaili
main.shortDesc: I specialize in turning data into powerful insights, creating impactful dashboards, and optimizing strategies to drive business success.

about.title: Data Analyst
about.about: üéì As an Information Systems undergraduate, I bring a passion for uncovering insights from data to fuel business growth. üí° With expertise in Python, SQL, and advanced visualization tools üìä, I craft data-driven strategies and actionable dashboards that empower decision making. üîç My experience spans data analysis, market research, and engagement optimization delivering measurable outcomes for businesses. üöÄ I'm eager to contribute my analytical mindset and technical skills to drive impactful results!

projects.name: Chatbot Aetheria
projects.techstack: Python, EC2, Application Load Balancing, Auto Scaling Group, SQL Alchemy, Qween LLM

educations.degree: Cloud and Gen AI Machine Learning
desc: Studied Cloud Computing on AWS, basic Python, Machine Learning, and Generative AI as part of the Studi Independent - Kampus Merdeka program by the Ministry of Education.
Developed 'Aetheria', a career-focused chatbot integrated with AWS and using Streamlit, providing personalized resume tips, interview practice, and job suggestions based on user skills.
Relevant courses include Computational Statistics, Computational Mathematics, Software Engineering, Database Systems, Database Administration, and Information Systems Analysis and Design.
Enhanced content performance and scheduling by conducting engagement analysis with Google Analytics, resulting in a 15% increase in engagement rates.
Developed and implemented social media strategies that consistently met KPIs by aligning content with audience preferences and industry trends.
Delivered data-driven reports to stakeholders, enhancing content strategy through actionable insights.
Conducted competitor analysis and market evaluations using Python and Excel, improving decision-making efficiency by 20% across regions.
Delivered detailed reports uncovering key market trends and hidden opportunities, supporting strategic company initiatives.
Managed multiple data analysis projects with a 90% on-time completion rate, showcasing strong time management and project coordination skills.
